shows.showDescription: ’Ivar Vivahitharayal’ tells the story of what all happens in the lives of young Vivek and Kavya, who get married to each other. Vivek, who did his MBA from Pondicherry, wants to get married as soon as he is back home after his studies. When his family opposes, he declares that he’d find his life-partner himself. Vivek has a circle of very close friends with whom he discusses everything. Prominent among these friends is Teresa, who too advises Vivek not ...Read Moreto get married so early and to wait till he finds a job. But Vivek has made his decision. It is thus that he finds Kavya, a radio jockey, whom he wants to marry. After the usual formalities they get married, but things take a different turn for Vivek. Kavya has something else on her mind. For her Vivek is the guy who, under some strange circumstances, was instrumental in her being thrown out of her job. She has to settle scores. That’s the reason she is in it....Hide

shows.showDescription: Sapna (Tabu) is the only daughter of a rich family. She is unable to take the family politics and hatred that prevail in her home and decides to run away. Free of her household, she meets Raj (Rishi Kapoor) and feels attracted to him. At first, Raju tries his best to get rid of her, but he also falls in love by and by. But what will happen when her family announce a reward in Sapna’s name?

shows.showDescription: Pooja (Pooja Bhatt) is the stubborn daughter of a shipping magnate Seth Dharamchand (Anupam Kher). She elopes from her house to be with her boyfriend as her father is not ready to get her married to him. Dharamchand announces a huge prize for searching her and also sends detectives after her. She comes across a news reporter Raghu Jetley (Aamir Khan), who is on the lookout for a major scoop. He instantly recognizes her and promises to help her with a thought of getting a...Read More story. Eventually they fall in love with each other. But before promising her of marriage, he has to gather some money. He leaves her sleeping in a cottage and goes to his publication office, with a hilarious story that Pooja is not marrying her lover but him. On the other hand the cottage owner thinks that the man has escaped without their rent and throws Pooja out. Pooja returns back to her father who has agreed to marry her to her lover. He then learns that during this time Pooja has felt in love with a simple man named Raghu. But, will Pooja marry him? Where is he?...Hide

In the meantime U.S. govt. is also in search of Romeo learns that Nihaal has seen him and ca...Read Morells him there. Nihaal travels to U.S. but puts a condition before them that he would help them only if they hand over Romeo to him....Hide

shows.producer: Scott Rudin, Andrew Niccol, Adam Schroeder, Edward S. Feldman
shows.showDescription: Truman Burbank (Jim Carrey) is not aware that his life is an open book the world over. He lives in the picture perfect town of Sea Haven or so he believes. What he does not know is that he is in a big studio monitored by 5000 cameras, hidden from view by director Christof (Ed Harris) who can film Truman’s every move and show it to the world in the most popular series – The Truman Show. Watch the film to see what happens when Truman gets to know the truth.
shows.trivia: The band uniforms that Truman was wearing belonged to the Blue Star Regiment of Riverside’s North High School.

shows.actor: Chris Evans, Kim Basinger, Jason Statham, Eric Christian Olsen, Eric Etebari
shows.showDescription: A woman is kidnapped out of her house and brought somewhere and locked in a room. Now there’s a phone in the room but before she could use it, her captor smashes it. She then tinkers with it and manages to get a dial tone but is unable to dial. She then crosses wires and contacts a young surfer. When she tells him that she has been kidnapped; he doesn’t believe her and/or care but he goes to the police to report the crime. When he gets to the station he gets ...Read Morethe run around. While waiting he hears the woman’s conversation with her captor and learns that her family’s in danger so he tries to help them but in the process of doing that he commits some acts that make the police think he’s a criminal or crazy; like stealing a car and brandishing a gun in public....Hide
shows.trivia: The phone that Ryan is using is actually not functioning, but he did have an earpiece in so he could talk to someone.

shows.producer: Steve Austin, Phillip B. Goldfine, Steven Seagal
shows.showDescription: Former Black Ops operatives Cross & Manning are assigned to decommission an old prison. But before they do so they must  oversee the arrival of two mysterious female prisoners.Before long, an elite force of mercenaries assault the prison in search of the new arrivals. As the true identities of the women are revealed, Cross realizes he’s caught in the middle of something far bigger than he had imagined.
shows.trivia: Part of the movie was filmed in a youth facility in Vancouver, British Columbia but production was kicked out as Man of Steel had come in to shoot there. They moved production to a shut down asylum.

shows.showDescription: A young man named Tristan (Charlie Cox) tries to win the heart of Victoria (Sienna Miller), the beautiful but cold object of his desire, by going on a quest to retrieve a fallen star. His journey takes him to a mysterious and forbidden land beyond the walls of his village. On his odyssey, Tristan finds the star, which has transformed into a striking girl named Yvaine (Claire Danes). However, there is not only Tristan who is after the star. A king’s (Peter O’T...Read Moreoole) four living sons - not to mention the ghosts of their three dead brothers - all need the star as they vie for the throne. Tristan must also overcome the evil witch, Lamia (Michelle Pfeiffer), who needs the star to make her young again....Hide
shows.trivia: All princes wear clothing with a pattern spelling out their number in Roman numerals, composed by smaller Arabic numerals. Furthermore, Septimus wears a vest with the numeral 7 on each button.

shows.precededBy: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
shows.producer: Chris Columbus, David Heyman, Mark Radcliffe
shows.showDescription: Harry Potter (Daniel Radcliffe) is waiting for the summer holidays to end so that he could leave his aunt’s home and get back to Hogwarts. Uncle Vernon’s (Richard Griffiths) sister Marge (Pam Ferris) comes home and insults Harry’s parents. Without meaning to, Harry manages to inflate Aunt Marge who floats up to the ceiling. Running away from home, Harry gets into the Knight Bus that takes him to the Leaky Cauldron. He meets Cornelius Fudge (Robert Hardy...Read More), the minister for magic. Fudge reassures Harry that he would not be expelled from Hogwarts for performing magic. Harry also finds out that Sirius Black (Gary Oldman), the convict, has escaped from the wizard prison Askaban. He is Voldemorte supporter. Everyone’s convinced that Sirius Black will come to get Harry. Will Harry survive?...Hide
shows.showTitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
shows.trivia: When Chris Columbus was still slated to direct, Robson Green was considered for the role of Sirius Black

shows.actor: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving, Joe Pantoliano
shows.awards: Won Oscar Awards in 2000 for Best Effects: John Gaeta, Janek Sirrs, Steve Courtley, Jon Thum; BAFTA Awards in 2000 for Best Visual Effects: John Gaeta, Steve Courtley, Janek Sirrs, Jon Thum
shows.producer: Joel Silver, Larry Wachowski, Andy Wachowski
shows.showDescription: Keanu Reeves stars in this sci-fi blockbuster as Thomas A. Anderson, an average computer programmer. He has an alter-ego by night as Neo, a malevolent hacker. The real story begins when Neo begins to question his reality; as he digs deeper, the truth is far more than he could imagine. The world is now captured by an army of machines that imprison human minds within an artificial reality called the Matrix. Neo has to fight the machines and determine what’s real and ...Read Morewhat’s not....Hide
shows.trivia: The scene in which Neo meets the gifted children in the Oracle’s apartment is an homage to the similar scene at the end of Akira (1988).

shows.actor: Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson, Helena Bonham Carter, Robbie Coltrane
shows.followedBy: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
shows.nominatedFor: Oscar Academy Awards in 2011 for Best Achievement in Art Direction: Stuart Craig, Stephenie McMillan, Best Achievement in Visual Effects: Tim Burke, John Richardson, Christian Manz, Nicolas Aithadi; BAFTA Film Award in 2011 for Best Make Up/Hair: Nick Dudman, Amanda Knight, Lisa Tomblin, (Warner Bros.), Best Special Visual Effects: Tim Burke, John Richardson, Christian Manz, Nicolas Aithadi.
shows.producer: David Heyman, David Barron, J. K. Rowling
shows.showDescription: Voldemort’s power is growing stronger. He now has control over the Ministry of Magic and Hogwarts. Harry, Ron, and Hermione decide to finish Dumbledore’s work and find the rest of the Horcruxes to defeat the Dark Lord. But little hope remains for the Trio, and the rest of the Wizarding World, so everything they do must go as planned.
shows.showTitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
shows.trivia: One of the posters in the café where the trio ends up after Apparating into London is from Daniel Radcliffe’s play ’Equus’.

shows.actor: Amanda Bynes, Colin Firth, Kelly Preston, Eileen Atkins, Anna Chancellor
shows.showDescription: Daphne (Amanda Bynes) lives with her mother in the USA. At seventeen, she is curious about her father. She finds out that he is a British politician and goes to England to meet him. Daphne has led a very casual life while her father’s life is seeped in formality. Will they ever find common ground?
shows.trivia: When Henry Dashwood is looking through the photo album of Daphne’s childhood, there are actual pictures of Amanda Bynes when she was younger.

shows.actor: Dwayne Johnson, Carla Gugino, Alexandra Daddario, Ioan Gruffudd, Archie Panjabi, Paul Giamatti
shows.showDescription: After the infamous San Andreas Fault finally gives, triggering a massive magnitude 9 earthquake in California, a search and rescue helicopter pilot (Dwayne Johnson) and his estranged wife make their way together from Los Angeles to San Francisco to save their only daughter. But their treacherous journey north is only the beginning. And when they think the worst may be over...it’s just getting started.
shows.trivia: Alexandra Daddario has only a 14 year age difference with Dwayne Johnson who plays her father, and 15 with Carla Gugino who plays her mother.
shows.writer: Carlton Cuse, Andre Fabrizio, Jeremy Passmore

shows.actor: Tom Cruise, Robert Duvall, Randy Quaid, Nicole Kidman, Cary Elwes
shows.showDescription: Cole (Tom Cruise) loves to race cars and is very good at it. But he is not focussed enough to win at races. Tim Daland (Randy Quaid) hires veteran car racer Harry Hogge (Robert Duvall) to build a car. He takes on Cole to drive it. Harry teaches Cole how to focus on winning, making use of his talent. Cole gets into a fight with the circuit’s star driver Rowdy Burns (Michael Rooker). They smash their cars and land in hospital. Cole recovers to get into racing again, ...Read Morewith Harry giving him a warning for careless behaviour. At the finals, Cole is set against Russ Wheeler (Cary Elwes) who is keen to break Cole. Will Cole get hurt again or go on to win the race?...Hide
shows.trivia: Most of the cars used in this film were actually Chevrolets outfitted with special fiberglass bodies made to resemble stock cars. The vehicles routinely broke down from the strain of the racing or had their bodies greatly damaged. At one point, half the fleet was in the repair shop.

shows.actor: Sacha Baron Cohen, Ben Kingsley, Anna Faris, Sayed Badreya, Rocky Citron
shows.producer: Sacha Baron Cohen, Alec Berg, Anthony Hines
shows.showDescription: Hafez Aladeen, an eccentric and repressive leader rules the Republic of Wadiya. His trip goes off beam when he is summoned to New York to a UN assembly to address concerns about his country’s nuclear weapons program.
shows.trivia: The photos of Aladeen’s other financially procured lovers in addition to Megan Fox include Lindsay Lohan, Halle Berry, Oprah Winfrey, and Arnold Schwarzenegger.

But Atasi Debi did not like the attitude of Raima. According to her Raima is not suitable for the Mukherjee family....Read More Mukherjee family is a joint family. Samu’s uncle Kripanath and Sadhin also live in that family. Suhdin was younger to Barin. During his college days he was arrested by police for a political reason. He was severely beaten at that time by the police. After returning from jail he lost his mental balance. Today the family physician Arunangshu Halder treats him. Arunangshu and his wife had a plan of marrying their daughter Shreeja with Samu. When Shreeja finds that Samu is interested in Raima, she planned to defame Raima. She became successful. She was insulted and asked to leave the Mukherjee family by Asati Debi. Before leaving she told the family that the treatment of Sadhin by the family physician is not proper, she thinks that Sadhin is quite OK. When Barin came to know about the insultation of Raima by Asati he fell ill due to massive heart attack. The family again treated him wrong. At the last moment as per Barin’s request Raima came and treated him. Barin babu was cured. Dr. Arunanangshu was proved to be a fraud. At last family Atasi realized her faults. Raima and Samu were united....Hide

shows.showDescription: Jayachandran (Simbhu) Mukut Pal is a born rowdy working in a hotel as a helper. He gets his title name "Thotti Jaya" as he is born in a garbage bin. People who confront him dread even his sheer presence. Seena Thana (Pradeep Rawat), a local rowdy notices Jaya’s qualities as a rowdy, makes him his right hand henchman and uses him in his anti-social activities. In an incident, Jaya gets entangled in a political and police trap. To escape from police, Jaya slips to Ca...Read Morelcutta and goes into hiding. Meanwhile Brinda (Gopika), a college lass from Kanyakumari comes to Calcutta on a tour along with her friends. Pimps operating in the red light area of Calcutta take away Brinda. Jaya accidentally meets Brinda when she tries to escape from the gang. He helps Brinda escape from the gang and takes her safely to Kanyakumari. On her way back home by train, Brinda starts admiring Jaya’s niceties and gradually falls in love with him. When she expresses her desire, Jaya reciprocates her love, and both decide to enter into wedlock but little does he know that Brindha is actually the daughter of Seena Thana. Jaya takes away Brinda from her house and thus, earns the wrath of Seena Thana. Angered by this, Seena Thana summons his rowdy gangs and plots to bump off Thotti Jaya. How Thottijaya accomplishes his hopes of marrying Brinda is told in the remaining part of the story....Hide

shows.actor: Sarath Kumar, Namitha, Laya, Vadivelu, Cochin Haneefa
shows.showDescription: Ganesh (Sarath Kumar) is an auto driver and a kindhearted man, who goes out of his way to earn money to help the poor and the needy. Ganesh likes to be in limelight.Knowing well that the media would sensationalize anything that is to do with popular people in the city, he kidnaps a businessman, and in another instance he implicates and submits himself to the police for a murder of an MLA that he does not commit. While he draws maximum publicity in the media, he creates a...Read More miserable life for the police. By his repeated pranks, Ganesh establishes himself as a person crazy only for publicity.People begin to call him ’Publicity’ Ganesh. Devanayaki (Namitha) owns a restaurant, and several autos run in her name in the local area. She is head over heels in love with Ganesh. She goes about wooing him. In most of her screen time she is singing and dancing with Ganesh. Meanwhile, Anjali (Laya) approaches Ganesh to act in her ad films in return for handsome money. But in true sprite she plays an undercover to investigate Ganesh’s past. Ganesh has a sorrow past. His past life and the reason for his current deeds are told in a flash back. Ganesh’s father (played by Sarath Kumar) is an upright person. He works as a clerk in a collectorate in a coastal village. A natural disaster strikes that area, and leaves many homeless in its wake. To ameliorate their problems, government allocates Rs. 20 crore to help the affected people rehabilitate. But the local assistant collector (Vincent), the local MLA, and the local SP together siphon off the grant, even while pretending to protect the best interest of the people. Ganesh’s father comes to know about the trio’s involvement behind the heist, and vows to expose them to the public. But the ’representatives of authority’ frames false charges and deceitfully turns the public outrage against the clerk. In a melee, Ganesh’s family is burnt alive. Ganesh escapes to the city, and avenges the death of his family. How Ganesh deceptively orchestrates the killing of the shenanigans is told lucidly in the remaining part of the story....Hide

shows.trivia: In the USA, there was a mere 18 days between the theatrical and home video releases. This is possibly a record for the shortest amount of time it has ever taken for any film to go from the cinema to home video in North America. On September 10, 2010 the movie was released in a limited capacity theatrically, and it was released on September 28, 2010 on DVD (sold exclusively at Walmart) and Blu-Ray (sold exclusively at Best Buy). The DVD and Blu-ray were later released to all national retailers on December 28, 2010.

shows.showDescription: The year is 1893 and the place is the village of Champaner in Central India. The country is under the British rule and it is Captain Russell (Paul Blackthorne) who is in charge of Champaner. Due to lack of rains, the farms have produced very less but the people are asked to pay Lagaan, the tax on farm produce, just as if the yield was normal. Captain Russell is quite arrogant and merciless and does not care about the poor villagers. The Rajah is but a figurehead and is n...Read Moreot able to do anything about the situation. Bhuvan (Aamir Khan) is a farmer who lives in the village with his mother. He has fire in his heart and wants to outwit the Englishman. But he is only a poor farmer. As luck would have it, the overconfident Captain Russell challenges Bhuvan and his friends to a game of cricket. If the Englishmen won, the farmers would have to pay Lagaan, three times the regular amount. And, if - Captain Russell is quite confident that it’s a very big if - Bhuvan and his team won, they would not have to pay Lagaan for three consecutive years. Bhuvan takes up the challenge, much to the villagers’ chagrin. They feel that he’s mad trying to outwit the mighty English. But young Bhuvan is quite determined and sets up a team of eleven. And what a team it is! Totally untrained, some of them don’t even have a clue as to what the game is all about. But again luck is on Bhuvan’s side when Russell’s sister Elizabeth (Rachel Shelley) goes over to help him train his strange cricket team. Will luck favour Bhuvan a third time to help him win the match?...Hide
shows.trivia: The first Bollywood production in 30 years to use synchronized sound. An Arri535 camera, brought over from Germany, was used to facilitate sync-sound recording. Most Indian films are dubbed entirely in the studio in the process known as ADR.

shows.showDescription: Babubhai (Paresh Rawal), Shyam (Suniel Shetty) and Raju (Akshay Kumar) are too rich now. They live in a bungalow with a swimming pool in their backyard and have a car each. Raju finds out that there is a scheme that would help him double his wealth in just 21 days. This is brought to him by the beautiful Anuradha (Bipasha Basu) who works for an agency in Mumbai’s business area. Only she insists that the minimum investment is one crore. Raju agrees immediately, not ...Read Morewanting to let go of the opportunity. Babubhai and Shyam sign away their investments to him and he still runs short of half the money. He dupes Pappu (Rajpal Yadav) into loaning him 50 lakhs and invests the required one crore. After 21 days, the three men go to the agency to collect their one crore, but are shocked to find that the office has just disappeared and Anuradha is not traceable. They are forced to give up their bungalow and life of luxury and move into a room in a chawl. Pappu visits them there, asking for his money back, as he has taken it from the don, Tiwari (Sharat Saxena). Now they have not just Pappu but also Tiwari chasing them for the money. How do the trio manage to escape Tiwari’s wrath? Will they ever recover their money? Find out on this hilarious comedy....Hide

shows.trivia: Sanjay was to play the role of Soman but, because of his hassles with the FMC, didn’t manage to give the required dates. When he finally did, Madhuri could not give matching dates.
